botMessages.message: Hi {!Contact.FirstName}! I'm Plutus, your digital financial assistant. You can ask me a question or select one of these popular topics to get started.
What would you like to do? Ask me anything, or tap one of these popular options.
Before you go, can you let me know how I did?
Oh great! I'm always happy to help!
Oh, I apologize. I'll get an expert to help you right away.
Before you go, can you let me know how I did?
Okay, thank you for your feedback!
{!Random_Bot_Message.Message_1__c}
{!Random_Bot_Message.Message_1__c}
{!Knowledge_Object_Search[0].Chat_Answer__c}
What type of appointment would you like to make?
Which type of product do you need us to work on?
What type of work do you need us to perform?
When and at what time would you like me to schedule the appointment?

retryMessages.message: Can you run that by me again? What date and time work well for you?
Sorry, I still didn't get it. Please tell me when you want the appointment. You can say something like Tuesday at 9am or June 15th at 12:00pm for example.

botMessages.message: We have an opening at that time. We are looking forward to seeing you during our upcoming visit.

üß† We are having a 25% off sale on Battery Backup systems. Since we are coming out for your repair, we could also add one to your home energy system. Would you like to talk to an expert about this promotion?
Ok, I'd like to run an automated Health Check on your 4-Panel Solar Starter Kit. Please be aware that power fluctuations may occur during this process. Are you ready to get started?
Ok, it looks like your energy production is lower than we would expect for your area. This is usually due to a simple adjustment to the angle of your solar panels. Would you like to learn more?
Ok, let's begin.
First, loosen the large black knobs on the back of your solar panel to allow the angle adjustment. Let me know when you are ready for the next step.
Now slide them back as far as they will go. Listen for them to click into position and then twist those black knobs down nice and tight so your panels stay put! Make sense?
All set! I will monitor your solar panels for the next 24 hours to make sure we see a boost in energy production and send you a text message tomorrow with an update.
Sorry, I couldn't find any of those records attached to your profile.
Would you like me to connect you with an expert to help track it down for you?
Sorry, an error occurred.
Here are some account options that I can help with:
Ok, check your email {!Contact.FirstName}. I've just sent you a password reset link.
Your current Mobile Phone is {!Contact.Phone} What would you like to change it to?
Ok, you're all set. We've updated your Mobile Phone to {!Contact.Phone}
Your current Email is {!Contact.Email} What would you like to change it to?
Ok, you're all set. We've updated your Email to {!Email}
Sorry it didn't work out.
Please let us know your reason for returning this order so that we can do better next time.
Please select your preferred repayment method.
Ok, I've submitted your return order. Please ship the product back to us and we will process your {!Repayment_Method} as soon as we receive your shipment.
For more information on how to change your address, please review the following knowledge article:

botMessages.message: You don't have any points yet, but get started by earning 1.5 points for every dollar spent on qualifying purchases.
You haven't yet opted-in for a dedicated account representative ...
Unfortunately I'm not equipped to help you with that today. Please clarify your question and your account rep will reach back out to you as soon as possible.
Got it. I've sent the request to your account rep, Allen Carter.

Thank you for reaching out. I understand you're requesting a fee waiver. Our fee waiver policy is based on certain criteria and circumstances. To better assist you, let me transfer you to the next available agent who can assist you with this.
